AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: former Morag Tong member
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was once a member of the Morag Tong, and may still have close contacts within the organisation. [PAWN_pronoun] always abided by the code, never once straying from it. After many years of faithful servitude, [PAWN_nameDef] decided to move on, and pursue [PAWN_possessive] dreams of farming ash yams.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Morag Tong veteran
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Once a veteran member of the Morag Tong, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually became too recognisable for [PAWN_possessive] own good. [PAWN_possessive] accomplishments were well known throughout Morrowind, and this painted a target on [PAWN_possessive] back. So, like many before [PAWN_objective], [PAWN_nameDef] took the voyage to Vounoura, to live out the rest of [PAWN_possessive] days in peace.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Morag Tong investigator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As an investigator in the Morag Tong, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked with seeking out those that have broken laws of the Tong. As unlike the Dark Brotherhood, the Morag Tong has an image to uphold, and [PAWN_nameDef] made sure that image was maintained
